topic.title: 주말 소풍 계획하기
topic.description: 친구와 함께 주말에 갈 소풍 계획을 세우는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 정말? 그럼 우리 공원에 소풍 가는 거 어때?
좋은 생각이야! 우리 뭐 좀 가져갈까?
그럼 나는 마실 거랑 돗자리를 가져갈게.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: They say the weather will be great this weekend.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: They say the weather will be great | this weekend.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Really? Then how about going on a picnic in the park?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Really? || Then how about going on a picnic | in the park?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: That's a great idea! What should we bring?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: That's a great idea! || What should we bring?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'll pack some sandwiches and fruit.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'll pack | some sandwiches and fruit.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Then I'll bring drinks and a picnic mat.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Then I'll bring drinks | and a picnic mat.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Perfect! What time should we meet?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Perfect! || What time should we meet?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Let's meet at the entrance of Central Park around 11 AM.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Let's meet | at the entrance of Central Park | around 11 AM.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay. I'm looking forward to the weekend!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay. || I'm looking forward to | the weekend!
